review: I got this to stream Amazon & Netflix at my cottage where I don't have cable.  I hooked up the fire stick & I couldn't get thru 2 minutes of a show on Amazon.  It would play 30 seconds, then spin for a while, then told me my bandwidth was too low for streaming, then more spinning, then blew out with "network connection lost".  Tried a couple more times with the same results.  Meanwhile, my ancient WII, laptop & kindle were all able to stream the same show flawlessly with no hesitation, on the same wireless connection at the same time the fire stick failed.  This is an awful product & I'm sending it back!
author: Barb Mathews
